requirements.description: Personal data or personal information collected by Unity, provided to Unity, or accessed by Unity can only be processed if you represent and warrant compliance with applicable privacy and data protection laws.
Data collection, disclosure, use and security practices can only be implemented if you provide clear notices, make required disclosures, and obtain necessary consent or permission from data subjects.
A privacy policy making appropriate disclosures to End-Users must be maintained, displayed and adhered to at all times.

type.summary: Maintain and appropriately disclose a privacy policy to end users

requirements.description: Your privacy policy must comply with all applicable privacy and data protection laws, regulations, requirements, terms, and guidelines.

type.summary: Compliance with Legal and Regulatory Framework

requirements.description: Your privacy policy must explain that Services Data will be processed in accordance with these Terms and the Unity Privacy Policy or ironSource Privacy Policy.

type.summary: Processing of Services Data in Compliance with Privacy Policies

requirements.description: Your privacy policy must disclose the use of tracking pixels, agents or other technologies that collect, use, share and store data about end users.
Your privacy policy must include a link to the Unity Privacy Policy or ironSource Privacy Policy, as applicable.
Your privacy policy must explain how End-Users can opt out of the Offerings, if applicable.
